name: Implement Retry Logic with Exponential Backoff
description: Add retry logic to an API client that fails on transient errors
goal: Implement retry logic with exponential backoff in api_client.py. The fetch_data() method should retry up to 3 times on transient errors (500, 502, 503, 504), with delays of 1s, 2s, 4s between retries. The test simulates a server that fails twice then succeeds.
